title: ‘They’re Not Some Magic Potion’: Why Do Ketones Still Cause Consternation in Pro Cycling?
content:
Several WorldTour teams openly use the 'grey area' performance enhancers, but some still fear their influence: What's driving the division?

Read the full article at ‘They’re Not Some Magic Potion’: Why Do Ketones Still Cause Consternation in Pro Cycling? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
